# Welcome to qgis_map


[![image](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/qgis_map.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/qgis_map)


**a Python library that provides a high-level, leafmap-like API for working with PyQGIS**


-   Free software: MIT License
-   Documentation: <https://giswqs.github.io/qgis_map>
